data.text:
1. POOJA SHARMA H.S Address: #17/12 LF Flats +91-9742666550 BTM 2nd Stage, Mico layout poojasharma.ps1712@gmail.com Bangalore - 76 CareerObjective: Effectively contribute the best and consolidate my learning’s in the stream of Finance & Accounts. To achieve high career growth through continuous learning process and serve my best to organization through hard work. Work Experience: Worked in Genpact as Associate (Market Research Analyst) in Retail Data Management from April 2015 to Nov 30th. Hewlett Packard (Global e-business operations pvt ltd) From (30th October 2013 to 5th December 2014) Domain- Supply chain management Department- Channel Sales Support Organization (CSSO) Team- channel pricing Worked as Process Associate. Company Summary: HP is a technology solutions provider to consumers, businesses and institutions globally. The company's offerings span IT infrastructure, personal computing and access devices, global services and imaging and printing for consumers, enterprises and small and medium businesses. Roles and Responsibilities: • Validating the end user name and address for authentication purpose. • Configuration of products in the line items and exporting those products through excel sheet for providing discount. • Giving new business opportunities to new customers in the market. • Providing the discounts based on the each product and depending on the quantity they require. • Providing the discounts as per the company guidelines.

2. • Getting the approvals from sales representatives. • Achieving consistently the TAT & Accuracy defined by the internal customers. • Pricing and configuration and quote communication. • Working on queries of the channel partners. Additional Responsibilities: • Publishing of day to day staff attendance report. Training: • Nominated by Team Manager to attended 2 days “Business Communications training” and “Advanced excel training” • Cross trained on different process under the same domain for extra headcount support when required. Tools workedon: • Eclipse • Seibel PRM • NCRF and ALIS • D&B and CRM • Other HP Internal tools Awards: • Rising star Award – Feb – 2014 Education Qualifications Course name Discipline/ Specialization Institution University/ Board Year of Passing Percentage B.COM FINANCE National Degree College, Basvangudi Bangalore Autonomous 2013 71% PU C COMMERCE (SEBA) S.S.M.R.V PU College,Jayanagar Bangalore Pre university Education Board Karnataka 2010 51%

3. S.S.L.C English Shanthinikethan trust school, Mico Layout Bangalore Karnataka state secondary education 2008 65.65% Software Proficiency • Operating system: Window7, Windows-XP , Windows 8 , Vista , Professional • MS Office, Visual Basic (Basic) 6.0 My strength: • A good team facilitator. • A very sincere and dedicated worker. • Self motivated and friendly. Project(6th Semester) Title: Consumer Perception towards Honda Dio and comparison between old model and new model ProjectDuration: 2 Months Objective: The main aim of this project is to notice the consumer preferences and taste while choosing or buying the product and the difference between 2 models and its ratings of the consumer’s survey. Operating System: Windows7 – notepad PersonalSkills • Ability to communicate and make presentations in a clear and concise manner. • Interested in learning new things.
